__TOC__


NOTE:  I have been unable to continue support for this team/idea.  If anyone wants to take over you are welcome to.

=== definition ===
provide central support & direction for all things wireless in Ubuntu.

=== goals ===
combine existing information into a central, human-readable format.  Be THE source for wireless support in ubuntu.

==== steps toward goal ====
* 1. compile a list of chipset IDs & corresponding drivers
* 2. provide access to drivers in one central location
* 3. create wireless driver script (if anyone is more familiar with bash scripts & is willing to help with this...)
* 4. work alongside central ndiswrapper to provide support for ubuntu.

=== members ===

if you would like to join & support the program, contact me.
